attributes.action: Ban the sale of "Energy Drinks" to those aged under 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most energy drinks, inclduing supermarket's own brand products have a warning on them that they are not suitable for children, however they are readily available to children and can be seen to have a large negative effect on their behaviour.  With this in mind, I feel that these drinks should no longer be sold to the under 18s
